snippet.title: Latebus // The Trailer
snippet.description:
A choose-your-own-adventure game featuring a late bus, an identity crisis, and several botched social interactions. Play for free, in browser: https://kapitha.itch.io/latebus

Latebus is coded using HTML and the Twinery engine. Background track is made with Soundtrap. The game has 13 endings and over 150 animations, drawn frame-by-frame in Photoshop. 



#game #indie #twine #gameplay #trailer #adventure #choose #your #own #story
